qas.question: In what century did the Xeer system begin?
In what region did the Xeer system develop?
What fact about Somali legal terms implies that Xeer developed locally?

context: The Xeer legal system is assumed to have developed exclusively in <a1_0>the Horn of Africa<a1_0/> since approximately the <a0_0>7th<a0_0/> century. There is no evidence that it developed elsewhere or was greatly influenced by any foreign legal system. The fact that Somali legal terminology is practically <a2_0>devoid of loan words<a2_0/> from foreign languages suggests that Xeer is truly indigenous.
